Greater nepal le sugauli sandhi bare utako mudda ma kina sarkar chup chan ani rabi g ko foundation le kina yesko partirodh gardaina .kina rabi g le euta singo desh ko mudda ma focus garnu hudaina yo television pardaina ta .desh ko maya nai na bhayeko sarkar kina haath ma chura ra sari lagayera chuppa basi rako xa ta kina india birudha aafule  gumayeko jamin ko bare action lina asharta chan ta .12 ota singapur banne jamin gumauda pani sarkar ko kunai pahal chaina ajhai .sugauli sandhi ma gumeko jamin euta greater nepal ko nirmaan ho euta greater nepal nirmaan le euta raamro ra thulo bhabisya bokeko xa .rabi g ko karodau fans laai yo television marfat sugauli sandhi ko mudda barema augat garaunu jaruri xa .rabi g euta rastar premi byakti le aafno rastro ko maag desh ko brihat  nirmaan sugauli sandhi ko mudda laai agadi badhaunu hola .
Tyo ghar beti lai ni arya ghat puraunu parne kasto nirdayi
Rabi sir harek boli le mero mutu chue chue hunxa yeti sacho kura haru garnu hunxa satya kura garnu salam xa rabi sir
